text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nde muuŋv kɨv, nde rɨgar gumgi vhɨrve, mbe Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvir harigi ntɨɨri khɨvav, mbe sure mbui ŋaara ndigip, ana muunga. Nde khueŋ kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme zumgum kha gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi ga suaŋv mbe suanga. Ana tuituigira nza kha Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvir kha gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav, mbe sure mbui gumgi, ana ne suaŋv guigira nza gangirga.
